nodes.text: The Encyclopedia was, from September 13, 2011 to July 1, 2014, the Databank's successor as the only official Star Wars information database made available to the public. It was replaced by another online encyclopedia called the Databank. It was available on StarWars.com. All entries featured a link to Wookieepedia. The Encyclopedia entries only contained information pertaining to the six Star Wars films and The Clone Wars series, and did not incorporate any Expanded Universe material, although they did include some extra background information not shown in the films or The Clone Wars themselves.
